name: Fallen London: Reunion
storyline: An Evasive Aristocrat has returned to London in search of his old family. Having fatally misplaced his bodyguard, he's in need of a new escort through London's underworld. But how much of his past does he really remember? Why does he seek it in Red Honey? Will he remember who he is before he returns to the Surface - if he returns at all?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for June, 2021
